name: Resistor Calculator 2001
description:
It's just you and The Resistor. There is fog here. 

Aim your soldering iron at the color bands of the resistor to change their value. 

Then the table will tell for what it's worth. 

!!!Now in full 3D!!!

Minimum Requirements: Gamer Rig

Best in fullscreen

WASD to move

Mouse to look around

Aim the dot in the center of the screen to click on things

Based on: https://maps.diy.re/res-calc/

Brought to you by DIYRE...

...not really though. I made it.

P.S. Sometimes 1 = 0.99999999... To a computer that is all the time.
